Data Types | Functions/Subroutines | Variables

smoothing Module Reference

all routines used to smooth the field onto the mesh, using tree methods if the code is running as a vortex filament this is simply the vorticity if a flux tube this smooths the magnetic field More...

Data Types

type  smoothing_grid
 mesh points on the smoothed mesh More...

Functions/Subroutines

subroutine setup_smoothing_mesh
 set up the smoothing mesh, if set in run.in
subroutine print_smooth_mesh (filenumber)
 print the smoothed mesh to a binary file for plotting with matlab/paraview
subroutine get_smoothed_field
 get the smoothed field on the smoothed mesh
subroutine tree_smooth (x, vtree, shift, wsmooth)
 given a specific position x, get the smoothed field wsmooth

Variables

real sm_res
 resolution of the smoothed mesh
real sm_sigma
 the smoothing length, set in terms of in run.in
type(smoothing_grid),
dimension(:,:,:), allocatable 		sm
 the array to calculate smoothed fields on

Detailed Description

all routines used to smooth the field onto the mesh, using tree methods if the code is running as a vortex filament this is simply the vorticity if a flux tube this smooths the magnetic field
